expertise.title: Data Engineering & Analytics
expertise.description: Designed and optimized large-scale ETL and ELT pipelines at Dell Technologies, processing over 100 million telemetry records monthly from Oracle, Greenplum, and REST APIs into Azure Data Lake with validation and auditability. Built analytics pipelines at Shaalastic powering ERP dashboards and institutional reporting for 10+ clients. Familiar with modern data-stack tools such as dbt, Kafka, and Delta Lake for scalable transformation and streaming.

expertise.title: Machine Learning & MLOps
expertise.description: Delivered forecasting and churn-prediction models using LightGBM, Random Forest, and ARIMA, deployed via Azure ML Studio and Flask APIs on AWS EC2. Integrated MLflow and containerized workflows with FastAPI at IpserLab for NLP pipelines. Currently extending into modern MLOps stacks using Kubernetes, Weights & Biases, and Prefect for experiment tracking and orchestration.

expertise.title: Cloud Infrastructure & DevOps
expertise.description: Architected and automated multi-cloud deployments across Azure and AWS. At Dell, implemented CI/CD for ETL frameworks and microservices using GitHub Actions, Docker, and Azure DevOps. At Shaalastic, built Lambda-based pipelines with CloudWatch monitoring and real-time alerts for ERP data ingestion. Experienced with Terraform, Helm, and Argo CD for infrastructure as code and deployment automation.

expertise.title: Full Stack & API Development
expertise.description: Developed backend microservices at Dell using Python and Java Spring Boot for the Enterprise Storage Order Delivery Platform serving 1,500+ clients. Built REST APIs and internal dashboards at Shaalastic with Flask and PostgreSQL, improving response speed by 35 percent. Skilled in designing secure, documented APIs using Swagger/OpenAPI and containerized delivery pipelines.

expertise.title: Business Intelligence & Governance
expertise.description: Migrated OBIEE dashboards to Power BI at Dell with Azure AD Row-Level Security and star-schema modeling for 1,500+ users. Built retention and adoption dashboards at Shaalastic, linking product metrics to business decisions. Experienced in enterprise governance using Data Catalogs, Collibra/Alation, and compliance frameworks like NIST 800-53, SOC 2, and FedRAMP.

expertise.title: AI, GenAI & LLM Systems
expertise.description: Implemented LLM and LangChain integrations at Dell using Azure OpenAI to enable natural-language telemetry queries and reduce manual analysis time by 35 percent. At IpserLab, engineered GenAI pipelines for text classification, retrieval-augmented generation, and experiment tracking through MLflow and Cloud Run. Expanding into vector databases, Pinecone, and LLMOps frameworks for production-grade generative AI.

aboutpara:
I design **intelligent data systems** at the intersection of **cloud, AI, and software**, building architectures that do more than move data and instead make it think. I have worked across both **enterprise and startup environments**, from optimizing telemetry pipelines at **Dell Technologies** to developing cloud-based data platforms and predictive models at **Shaalastic and IpserLab**. My focus is on creating **reliable, scalable, and secure systems** that transform raw information into intelligent action.

I thrive where **data engineering meets machine learning**, creating pipelines that evolve into **full-stack analytics and MLOps workflows**. Whether it is **Azure, AWS, or GCP**, I focus on how efficiently data flows, how models deploy, and how insights drive meaningful results. My approach is built around solving complex problems with precision, automating wherever possible, and ensuring that every system remains **resilient and self-healing**.

I hold a **Master's in Engineering Science and Data Science** from the **University at Buffalo** and a **Bachelor's in Information Technology**. These programs strengthened my foundation in **cloud computing, big data systems, and applied machine learning**, shaping my ability to bridge data infrastructure with intelligent decision systems.

Outside of work, I find balance in speed and sound, often exploring open roads on my bike or car, or spending time in the gym with hip-hop music pushing my limits. The same energy that drives my rides defines my engineering mindset, always in control, always learning, and always moving forward.
